post.text: In America, we lift each other up. We build bridges, not walls. We stand together because we're stronger together.

comment.author: Austin
comment.text: Gag me with your catchphrase. I find the Trump supporters far more intellectually capable of communicating their stances. So many Hillary supporters can't seem to express any redeeming qualities or rational reason for voting for such a lifetime criminal. Most of them use accusations toward Trump supporters and unsubstantiated "facts."

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: Cameron very immature response. Proves my point

replies.author: Derek
replies.text: Have you not watched the news? She did nothing wrong, and the cases are closed.

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: That's the funniest comment of the week "Trump supporters far more intellectually capable". And by intellectual of course you mean name calling and making up lies and conspiracy theories.

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: Jessica we know you are intellectually bankrupt as usual, as again, my point is made by your empty remark.
